content: फक्किका {@--1@} A position, an argument to be proved, a thesis or assertion to be maintained; फणिभाषितभाष्यफक्किका विषमा कुंडलनामवापिता <ls>N. 2. 95.</ls> {@--2@} A prejudice, preconceived opinion. {@--3@} A sophistical argument, sophism. {@--4@} A trick, fraud. {@--5@} Logical exposition.
